title: Lift the Shadow Curse
content: lagh is dead by casting Speak with Dead on Art's body. This will let you ask him about Thaniel. After you do so, talk to Halsin to continue the quest. This is one of the times where you can ask more than five questions to the target during Speak with Dead. Proceeding to the Gauntlet of Shar Inner Sanctum before this quest triggers Art's death[please confirm]. Finishing this quest will not actually remove the shadow curse from around Moonlight Tower.
